32  void xml_archive::open(std::string file_name, opening_mode mode) {
33  init(file_name, mode == load);
34  }
35 
42  void xml_archive::init(std::string file_name, bool loading) {
43  done();
44  if (loading) {
45  //throw eternity::exception("opening XML archive " + file_name + " error");;
46  m_pCurElement = m_oParser.scan_file(file_name);
47 
48  if (m_pCurElement == NULL) throw eternity::exception("opening XML archive " + file_name + " error");
49 
50  m_pCurElement = m_pCurElement->foundChild("archive", 0);
51 
52  if (m_pCurElement == NULL) throw eternity::exception("file " + file_name + " is not a valid eternity XML archive");
53 
54  } else {
55  m_oOut.open(file_name.c_str());
56 
57  m_oOut << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>" << endl;
58  m_oOut << "<!-- eternity persistence framework -->" << endl;
59  m_oOut << "<!-- Nicola Santi - www.winghands.it -->" << endl;
60  m_oOut << "<archive version=\"4.0\" sub=\"beta1\">" << endl;
61  }
62 
63  set_loading(loading);
64  }
65 
66  void xml_archive::formatting() {
67  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_nTab; ++i) m_oOut << "\t";
68  }
69 
71 
72  std::string xml_archive::read(std::string key, int pos) {
73  if (!is_loading()) throw eternity::exception("read attempt on an archive open for storing.");
74  if (m_pCurElement) {
75  //const SimpleXMLParser::Element& e = (*m_pCurElement)(key.c_str(), pos);
76  //string tmp(e.GetValue());
77  //return tmp;
78 
79  if (m_pCurElement->foundChild(key, pos) == NULL) throw eternity::exception("archive not compatible with class to load.");
80 
81  return m_pCurElement->foundChild(key, pos)->value;
82  //return std::string((*m_pCurElement)(key.c_str(), pos).GetValue());
83  } else return "";
84  }

122  void xml_archive::make_branch(std::string name, std::map<std::string, std::string> attributes) {
123  if (is_loading()) throw new eternity::exception("called make_branch on a loading archive");
124 
125  formatting();
126  m_oOut << "<" << name;
127 
128  std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator i = attributes.begin();
129 
130  for (; i != attributes.end(); ++i)
131  m_oOut << " " << (*i).first << "=\"" << (*i).second << "\"";
132 
133  m_oOut << ">" << endl;
134 
135  m_nTab++;
136 
137  m_dBranches.push_front(new node(name));
138 
139  }
140 
142 
143  std::map<std::string, std::string> xml_archive::enter_branch(std::string name, size_t pos) {
144  if (is_storing()) throw new eternity::exception("called enter_branch on a storing archive");
145 
146  node* m_pPrevElement = m_pCurElement;
147 
148  //Save current XML element before move to the next one
149  m_pCurElement = m_pCurElement->foundChild(name, pos);
150 
151  m_dBranches.push_front(m_pPrevElement);
152 
153  return m_pCurElement->attributes;
154  }
155 
157 
158  void xml_archive::leave_current_branch() {
159  if (is_storing()) {
160  if (m_dBranches.size() == 0) throw new eternity::exception("make_branch()/leave_current_branch() mismatch");
161  m_nTab--;
162  formatting();
163  m_oOut << "</" << m_dBranches[0]->name << ">" << endl;
164  delete m_dBranches[0];
165  m_dBranches.pop_front();
166  } else {
167  if (m_dBranches.size() == 0) throw new eternity::exception("enter_branch()/leave_current_branch() mismatch");
168  m_pCurElement = m_dBranches[0];
169  m_dBranches.pop_front();
170  }
171  }
172 
173 
174 }
